name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Party - Sync Videos With Friends

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch any video (Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, and more) in sync with friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy your favorite shows with friends, anywhere. The Watch Party extension synchronizes video playback to your streaming experience, perfect for long-distance movie nights.
